reuters.title: FOMC BRIEFED ON PARIS ACCORD AT FEBRUARY 23 TELEPHONE MEETING, FED SAYS
reuters.body: General Motors Corp's Pontiac Division said it is introducing a summer lease merchandising program that will run from April Six through August Three. It said the plan features a special GMAC 50-month retail schedule with low lease payments on selected Pontiacs. Participating dealers will offer monthly payments starting at 179 dlrs for a Pontiac Sunbird, it said. Reuter 
